original_text: David's son Solomon made himself a strong ruler over his kingdom. The Lord his God was with Solomon, so that he became a great king.
korean_text: 다윗의 아들 솔로몬의 왕위가 견고하여 가며 그의 하나님 여호와께서 그와 함께 하사 심히 창대하게 하시니라

sentences.original_text: David's son Solomon made himself a strong ruler
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 아들 솔로몬은 스스로 강한 통치자가 되었다

sentences.original_text: The Lord his God was with Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 주 그의 하나님이 솔로몬과 함께 계셨다

sentences.original_text: so that he became a great king
